Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Mrs. Siggard's life prior to or as the outbreak began, except that she had a husband . They lived on a farm and had at least one horse.
Post-Apocalypse[]: Rick Grimes stops at Siggard's farm hoping there would be some gas available. Rick looks into the window only to find the corpses of Mr. and Mrs. Siggard.
Death[]: Killed By Mr. Siggard (Out of Mercy, Assumed) She was possibly shot by her husband, who then committed suicide, as an act of desperation.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Mrs. Siggard has killed: Possibly a few zombies
Relationships[]: Mr. Siggard † - Husband and Possible Out of Mercy Killer Siggard Family Horse † - Pet
